meta.description: Optimize the allocation of land for growing turnips and pumpkins to maximize revenue given constraints on watering time and pesticide budget.

sets.name: CROPS
sets.description: Types of crops the farmer can grow.

params.name: water_time
params.description: Minutes of watering required per acre for each crop.

params.name: pesticide_cost
params.description: Cost of pesticide per acre for each crop.

params.name: revenue
params.description: Revenue per acre for each crop.

params.name: total_water_time
params.description: Total available watering time in minutes.

params.name: total_pesticide_budget
params.description: Total available budget for pesticide in dollars.

vars.name: acres
vars.description: Acres of land allocated to each crop.

objective.name: max_total_revenue
objective.description: Maximize the total revenue from growing turnips and pumpkins.

constraints.name: land_constraint
constraints.description: Total acres allocated cannot exceed available land.

constraints.name: water_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total watering time used cannot exceed available watering time.

constraints.name: pesticide_budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total pesticide cost cannot exceed available budget.
